## Build results
bin/
obj/
out/

## .NET Core / ASP.NET
*.dll
*.exe
*.pdb
*.cache
*.log

## User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

## Visual Studio
.vs/
.vscode/
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
*.nupkg
*.snupkg

## Rider / JetBrains
.idea/

## OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini

## ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

## Secrets & environment files
appsettings.Development.json
appsettings.Production.json
appsettings.Staging.json
secrets.json
.env
.env.*

## Logs
logs/
*.log

## Test results
TestResults/
coverage/
*.coverage
*.coveragexml

## Publish output
publish/
wwwroot/lib/

## EF Core
Migrations/*.Designer.cs
Migrations/*.Snapshot.cs

## Node (if frontend or tooling exists)
node_modules/

## Certificates
*.pfx
*.cer
